name: Steven Terry
text: Really disappointed that this is what constitutes a $14 9" gluten free pizza. Looks completely uninspired and eventhough I picked it up 5min BEFORE the 715pm time I requested, it was like warm at best. Not sure we will be back, which is a bummer since we live close and need a gluten free option.

name: Nana Tilda
text: 40 minute drive to get this delicious pie. Levi took my call and seemed genuinely happy to take the order. He made some recommendations that were appealing, he did a fire roasted cajun crust* that had quite a kick, phew hot and very good â€¦More

name: Berkie Allen
text: First time there, very pleased with the cost and quality. I don't hand out 5 starts often. This was very close to perfection for pizza. Haven't tried anything else they offer yet, but you can bet I will go back many more times. You guys just need more locations around town. The sandwiches look good.

text: Google had the closing time as 11pm but it's 10pm Sunday - Thursday. I ordered online at the near litteral last second because someone keeps giving Google the wrong close time for them. I felt bad but the staff was awesome and understanding. Awesome staff and amazing deep dish cheese bread.

text: Very little sauce and cheese, nobody could actually tell there was anything other than pizza dough, which was very thick.  It was exactly like the bread only sliced differently.  Never again,  too many other pizza makers to go to.

name: JEFF Devlieger
text: Howie Rolls are amazing! If you like sbarros strombolis or strombolis in general, you will love these. Add extra toppings for $1 if ordering pizza ask for the square pizza. Its thicker and much more tasty then the round. Round is good but the square one all 6 of us agree is much better!
